title: Xerath got buffed? Secret buff?
body:
I went against a xerath and maybe it was my brain lag but his w seemed to hit like a LOT quicker now.
Maybe it was just the skin that made him faster?
Started to respect xerath early damage after that
I watched an old ll stylish video and it seemed like w was super slow. 
I've never heard of it so if anyone knows tell me xd

replies.body:
He may have just been firing it off without letting it charge up all the way. That ability lets him channel to increase the range, but it can be fired off immediately as well.

Definitely not any secret buffs AFAIK!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MMfjguN7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-12T05:15:03.586+0000)
>
> He may have just been firing it off without letting it charge up all the way. That ability lets him channel to increase the range, but it can be fired off immediately as well.
> 
> Definitely not any secret buffs AFAIK!

Bro thanks 
Idk lol maybe my brain was lagging that day
I actually had to predict where he was going to shoot it to juke it
Brain lag probs
xd
Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MMfjguN7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-12T05:15:03.586+0000)
>
> He may have just been firing it off without letting it charge up all the way. That ability lets him channel to increase the range, but it can be fired off immediately as well.
> 
> Definitely not any secret buffs AFAIK!

Can he charge his W.....?
My bad fam that was his Q that charges, don't play Xerath all that often myself. I don't believe anyone reduced how fast his W fires off either.
